summary.para: Sets text that is retrieved by which accessibility tools use to obtain the Name Property of an object.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string containing the name.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that can be used by an accessibility application.
